page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: With the lack of evening or day classes in our block, hobbies are mostly confined to the{home. }Popular hobbies include knitting, sewing, T.V. and videos. {Outside hobbies include fishing, shooting, beekeeping, going to ploughing matches, and parachuting nearby at Fordoun. Gardening is popular, and an increasing number of greenhouses are being built. People travel up to 25 miles to the theatre and to evening classes of their choice. Reading as a hobby is made available to all by the weekly library van calling at the shop and council houses. The van also carries a stock of records. The women can meet once a month at the S.W.R.I. The children enjoy playing outside - weather permitting - and bicycling is very popular.
